definitions.definition: A straight line which a curve approaches arbitrarily closely as it goes to infinity . The limit of the curve; its tangent "at infinity".
Anything which comes near to but never meets something else.

main_definition: ( mathematical analysis ) A straight line which a curve approaches arbitrarily closely as it goes to infinity . The limit of the curve; its tangent "at infinity".
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , figuratively ) Anything which comes near to but never meets something else.
